description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Flytrap is an arcade-style game where you control an anthropomorphic venus flytrap as it defends baby Flytraps from attacking enemies. Since you're a venus flytrap, you not only need to stop enemies in their tracks with a squirt gun, but also swallow them down with your inhale attack.
description.short: Flytrap is an arcade-style game where you control an anthropomorphic venus flytrap as it defends baby Flytraps from attacking enemies. Since you're a venus flytrap, you not only need to stop enemies in their tracks with a squirt gun, but also swallow them down with your inhale attack.
